title: The Railrodder
creator_credit: Gerald Potterton, Julian Biggs and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Buster Keaton rides across Canada from Atlantic to Pacific on a railway trolly, showing his characteristic silent comic style against the background of the Canadian countryside.
